description: Delicious cuisine from Puglia, including excellent orecchiette pasta with clams and chickpeas, served in a delightful ambience with a number of different rooms and internal patios. The same traditional atmosphere is evident in the attractive, well - equipped guestrooms, as well as in the picturesque swimming pool housed in a grotto.
